description:
Non-material amendment to planning consent ref: P2021/1775/FUL dated 23/11/2021 which sought permission for: Proposed demolition of existing mansard storey and roof level plant installation and erection of a replacement fifth floor, new sixth floor and mechanical plant at roof level with acoustic screening. Plus extensions at first to fourth floor to the River House rear elevation on Crawford Passage (including third to fifth floor balconies) and use of the first-floor rear flat roofs as amenity terraces along with amendments to the ground level facade to facilitate new internal configuration. 

Amendments propose: Increase in height of plant area above the 6th floor due to technical matters such as fire, thermal, and acoustic performance; drainage design; and structural/services coordination.
decision_conditions: The proposed amendment would not constitute a Non-Material Amendment. It is considered that the amendments which seek to increase the scale and mass of the proposed development are too significant to constitute a material amendment to the originally approved scheme, and therefore the changes would need to be assessed under a new Full Planning Application.
